translation.nerd: ValidationResult: You are not logged in
ValidationResult: You are in the black list of photo's author
ValidationResult: Commenting is not allowed to candidates
ValidationResult: The Author did not allow commenting
ValidationResult: The author allowed commenting to members only
translation.ru: Автор разрешил комментирование только членам клуба

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: The photo had been uploaded more then $1 days ago and has been archived
translation.ru: Работа загружена больше чем $1 дней назад и перемещена в архив

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: This is your own photo
ValidationResult: Voting is not allowed to candidates
ValidationResult: The author allowed voting to members only
translation.ru: Автор разрешил оценивать работу только членам клуба

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: You have negative rank ( $1 ) in category $2
translation.ru: У вас негативный ранг ( $1 ) в разделе '$2'

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: You can not vote for your own rank.
translation.ru: Вы не можете голосовать за свой собственный ранг

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: You are not the member yet. Voting for member ranks in photo categories is not allowed to candidates.
translation.ru: Голосование за ранг пользователя в разделе разрешено только членам клуба

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: You have an negative rank in category '$1'.
translation.ru: У вас негативный ранг в разделе '$1'

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: You have already voted when member's rank is $1 in category '$2'
translation.ru: Вы уже голосовали, когда ранг пользователя в разделе '$2' был $1

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: The member does not have enough photos in category $1 ( there are $2 photos but has to be at least $3 ones ).
translation.ru: У пользователя недостаточно работ в разделе $1 ( загружено $2 работ(ы), для ранга должно быть не менее, чем $3 ).

translation.nerd: ValidationResult: You are in the black list of $1.
ValidationResult: You can not comment the photo
